entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY ENDED, London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:43 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 5:49 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: W 27 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to flurries near midnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
